    • main

      public static java.lang.String main​(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String[] difficulty) throws java.io.IOException
      Gets a given simfile's BPM and initial offset, calls the method getAllNotes to save all notes into an array, then returns a string from the method measuresToOsuNotes.
      Parameters:
      filename - The filename of a simfile
      difficulty - The difficulty of a simfile
      Returns:
      String with all notes in a Osu Format
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • getSongInfo

      public static java.lang.String[] getSongInfo​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Scans a given simfile for information on title, artist and the name of the audio file, then puts that information in to an array
      Parameters:
      filename - The filename of a simfile
      Returns:
      An array with song information
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • getBpm

      public static double getBpm​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Scans a given simfile for the #BPMS tag and checks if it has more than one BPM value, then returns the BPM of the simfile, or returns 0 if there are BPM changes in the simfile
      Parameters:
      filename - The filename of a simfile
      Returns:
      The simfile's BPM
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • getOffset

      public static int getOffset​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Scans a given simfile for the #OFFSET tag and takes the value and converts it from seconds to milliseconds
      Parameters:
      filename - The filename of a simfile
      Returns:
      The offset in milliseconds
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException

    • measureToOsuNotes

      public static java.lang.String measureToOsuNotes​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> notes, int msPerNote, int currentOffset)
      A helper method for allMeasuresToOsuNotes. Goes through each element in the current measure's array and sets the current millisecond count and key position for each element/note, then instantiates a new OsuHitObject with those values. The instance method toOsuFormat is called on the OsuHitObject, concatenating to the string hitObjectOutput with a linebreak. This is repeated for the whole measure which then returns a string containing a whole measure in Osu formatting.
      Parameters:
      notes - The input measure that needs to be converted
      msPerNote - The millisecond count per each note element in the notes parameter
      currentOffset - The current offset from the start from the simfile
      Returns:
      String of the measure's notes in Osu Format

    • beatToMilliseconds

      public static int beatToMilliseconds​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> measure, double bpm)
      Converts a given measure's time property from beats to milliseconds
      Parameters:
      measure - All the current notes in a measure
      bpm - The BPM for a measure
      Returns:
      Millisecond count for a beat

    • allMeasuresToOsuNotes

      public static java.lang.String allMeasuresToOsuNotes​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> notes, double bpm, int offset)
      Converts array of simfile notes to Osu-formatted notes. Divides input array to smaller subarrays, one for each measure, calculates the timings of the notes within the array, while accounting for current measure and initial offset, from beats and measures to milliseconds, then returns a string of notes divided by newline.
      Parameters:
      notes - Array containing all the notes of a simfile
      bpm - The BPM of a simfile
      offset - The initial offset of a simfile
      Returns:
      String of all notes as in an Osu format

    • getDiff

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getDiff​(java.lang.String filename) throws java.io.IOException
      Scans a simfile for difficulty information and adds each difficulty's information in a String array then adds that array into an arraylist where each element represents each difficulty in the simfile
      Parameters:
      filename - The filename of a simfile
      Returns:
      An array list with string arrays with all difficulty data
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • getAllNotes

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAllNotes​(java.lang.String filename, java.lang.String[] difficulty) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Scans all the note data from a specified difficulty of a simfile and adds all the notes as elements in an arraylist with seperators for measures
      Parameters:
      filename - The filename of a simfile
      difficulty - The difficulty of a simfile
      Returns:
      String ArrayList with all note data
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException
